tabAssignment.description: Organize your tabs efficiently by assigning them to appropriate categories.
tabAssignment.applyButtonTooltip: Apply category grouping to browser tabs
features: All tabs from the same domain use the same category
Create tab groups in browser with Apply button
tabAssignment.tip: Categories are assigned by domain. When you change a tab's category, all tabs from the same domain (e.g., all github.com tabs) will use the same category.

aiLearningStatus.title: AI Learning Status
aiLearningStatus.description: TabQuest is currently learning your browsing patterns. The AI gets smarter every time you recategorize tabs or open new ones.

aiSmartOrganize.description: AI learns your browsing patterns and automatically organizes your tabs.
details: Intelligent classification considering usage time and context

proTips.title: Pro Tips
tips: When you manually recategorize tabs, AI learns your preferences
Using different categories during work and personal time helps AI distinguish by time period
Opening related tabs together helps AI understand context and classify more accurately
